mapper.insert: insert into t_general_edit (uid, user_uid, biz_uid, biz_type, reason, summary, old_content, content, audit_status, create_time, update_time) values (REPLACE(UUID(), '-', ''), #{generalEdit.userUid}, #{generalEdit.bizUid}, #{generalEdit.bizType}, #{generalEdit.reason}, #{generalEdit.summary}, #{generalEdit.oldContent}, #{generalEdit.content}, #{generalEdit.auditStatus}, #{generalEdit.createTime}, #{generalEdit.updateTime})
